docs.snippet: It's one thing for a business dispute to knock out CBS programming in some three million homes during rerun season. Football season is another matter entirely, and there's little immediate cause for optimism....
docs.lead_paragraph: It's one thing for a business dispute to knock out CBS programming in some three million homes during rerun season. Football season is another matter entirely, and there's little immediate cause for optimism.

headline.main: CBS Blackout Dispute Threatens Football Fans
headline.print_headline: CBS Blackout Dispute Threatens Football Fans

docs.snippet: The walk-on tryouts for the West Virginia football team offered would-be Mountaineers a shot at the reward for nearly all winners: zero playing time....
docs.lead_paragraph: The walk-on tryouts for the West Virginia football team offered would-be Mountaineers a shot at the reward for nearly all winners: zero playing time.
docs.abstract: Walk-on tryouts for West Virginia University football team offer would-be Mountaineers a shot at the reward for nearly all winners, a chance to serve in vital but unheralded role of impersonating the opponent at practice each week.

headline.main: They Might Walk On, but They’ll Undoubtedly Sit

docs.snippet: "The video footage illustrates some of the most sickening human suffering imaginable." — British Prime Minister David Cameron addressing lawmakers before a vote on military action in Syria. A grim-faced Cameron conceded after the vote failed...
docs.lead_paragraph: "The video footage illustrates some of the most sickening human suffering imaginable." — British Prime Minister David Cameron addressing lawmakers before a vote on military action in Syria. A grim-faced Cameron conceded after the vote failed to pass that "the British Parliament, reflecting the views of the British people, does not want to see British military action."
